title: Snake Plant
description: Low-maintenance plant that filters formaldehyde and nitrogen oxide. Ideal for indoor air purification.

title: Spider Plant
description: Fast-growing plant known for removing carbon monoxide and xylene from the air.

title: Peace Lily
description: Beautiful flowering plant that eliminates mold spores and improves indoor air quality.

title: Aloe Vera
description: Versatile plant that purifies the air and provides healing benefits for skin irritations.

title: Boston Fern
description: Effective at removing pollutants like formaldehyde and xylene while adding humidity to the air.

title: Areca Palm
description: Popular indoor plant that removes toxins such as benzene and carbon monoxide.

title: Rubber Plant
description: Large indoor plant known for removing toxins like formaldehyde and improving indoor air quality.

title: Dracaena
description: Tough plant that filters out chemicals like trichloroethylene and xylene from the air.

title: English Ivy
description: Climbing plant that reduces mold and airborne fecal matter particles, ideal for bathrooms.

title: Bamboo Palm
description: Compact palm that improves indoor air quality by filtering benzene and formaldehyde.

title: Philodendron
description: Heart-shaped leaves that effectively remove formaldehyde from the air.

title: Chinese Evergreen
description: Durable plant that thrives in low light and removes harmful toxins like benzene and formaldehyde.

title: Golden Pothos
description: Trailing vine that cleans the air of carbon monoxide and formaldehyde.

title: Gerbera Daisy
description: Flowering plant that removes benzene and trichloroethylene from the air, ideal for bedrooms.
